description.value:
When your mind is targeted, this armor lashes your foes with a pulse of psychic energy.

Armor: Chain or Scale

Enhancement Bonus: AC

Property:

You gain resist 5 psychic.

Level 14 or 19: Resist 10 psychic.

Level 24 or 29: Resist 15 psychic.

Power - Daily (Immediate Reaction)

Trigger: An enemy attack hits your Will.

Effect: Each enemy in a close burst 1 centered on you takes psychic damage equal to 3 + the armor's enhancement bonus and a -2 penalty to attack rolls for attacks that include you as the target until the end of your next turn.

Augment 1: The size of the burst increases to 2.
